import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import "../layout/table.css" export default function AllCateg() { const [data, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch('http://localhost:8081/all-categ') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setData(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }, []) return(
{data.map((d, i) => ( ))}
# Title Category Year Published
{i+1} {d.title} {d.category} {d.year}
) }
